name: Moonlit Chalice
description: A delicate, crystal chalice that shimmers with a soft, moonlit glow. The rim is etched with tiny, swirling patterns that seem to shift as you look at them.

name: Flickering Candle
description: A single candle made from a branch of iridescent mistletoe, its flame flickering in time with the pulse of the labyrinth's energy. The scent of moonflowers wafts from it, drawing you deeper into the mystery.
